blogPost.excerpt: You know, you really shouldn't have to settle for emojis that only kind-of express how you feel. Punctuate your deepest sentiments and pull off those more-subtle remarks with this Very Necessary (and expanding) iMessage sticker pack.
blogPost.body: You know, you really shouldn't have to settle for emojis that only kind-of express how you feel. Punctuate your deepest sentiments and pull off those more-subtle remarks with this Very Necessary (and expanding) iMessage sticker pack.
blogPost.title: Very Necessary Emojis - For very sarcastic people
blogPost.author: Aviv Stein

localize.description: 你知道，你真的不应该满足于那些只能表达你感受的表情符号。用这个 "非常必要"(和扩展的)iMessage贴纸包来点缀你最深沉的情感，并拉出那些更微妙的评论。
你知道，你真的不應該滿足於那些只能表達你感受的表情符號。用這個 "非常必要"(和擴展的)iMessage貼紙包來點綴你最深沉的情感，並拉出那些更微妙的評論。

previous.excerpt: Teams by CALA is now available. With Teams, users can collaborate on the clothing design and manufacturing processes within one platform, eliminating siloed conversations among the sometimes 20+ specialists that work to bring fashion collections to life.
previous.title: CALA - Teams - How fashion brands run their business.

localize.description: CALA的团队现已上市。有了Teams，用户可以在一个平台上对服装设计和制造流程进行协作，消除了有时超过20名专家之间的孤立对话，他们的工作是将时尚系列变为现实。
CALA的團隊現已上市。有了Teams，用戶可以在一個平臺上對服裝設計和製造流程進行協作，消除了有時超過20名專家之間的孤立對話，他們的工作是將時尚系列變爲現實。

next.excerpt: Focus on the three most important tasks every day. To be really effective you have to pick up the three most significant tasks per day. A massive productivity improvement and considered by many experts to be the best to-do strategy. Look it up!
next.title: 3 Things - Focus on the 3 most important things today

localize.description: 每天专注于三个最重要的任务。要想真正提高工作效率，你必须每天拿起最重要的三项任务。大幅度提高生产力，被很多专家认为是最好的待办事项策略。看看吧!
localize.tagline: 专注于今天最重要的3件事
